sentence.Network_en: Menstruum crystal is widely used in cephalosporin production in view of its stability and high purity.
sentence.Network_cn: 溶媒结晶由于其稳定性和纯度高被广泛用于头孢菌素生产中.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in sense 1): from Latin, neuter of menstruus 'monthly', from mensis 'month'. Sense 2 is by alchemical analogy of the supposed agency of a solvent in the transmutation of metals into gold with the supposed action of menses on the ovum

means.word_mean: 2. the monthly discharge of blood from the uterus of nonpregnant women from puberty to menopause;

sentences.sentence: "the women were sickly and subject to excessive menstruation"
"a woman does not take the gout unless her menses be stopped"--Hippocrates
"the semen begins to appear in males and to be emitted at the same time of life that the catamenia begin to flow in females"--Aristotle
